title: Spotify removes R. Kelly's music from its playlists
text:
Spotify removes R. Kelly's music from its playlists 8:27pm BST - 00:50
The music streaming service says his music will still be on Spotify, but it will not actively promote it. Alicia Powell reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The music streaming service says his music will still be on Spotify, but it will not actively promote it. Alicia Powell reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2KQ4E09
